item.description:
Come join for our second Saturday meetup of April! Just a reminder that we will have a Sunday meetup on the second weekend of the month, and a Saturday meetup on the fourth weekend of the month. More fun for the dogs! Please be aware that these rarely last 2 hours with the dogs so try and get there on the early side! If for some unknown reason it's below freezing or raining then we will move to Doggie Day on Tremont Street-I'll update accordingly the day before based on weather predictions. We will only be there for about an hour so if you want to grab your treat bag try and come early!

~Terri & Simon & Louie

Cancellation procedure: Unless there is a snowstorm we are on! I'll email around 8AM if the weather we cancel. Please use your discretion driving in foul weather.

Please note: Meetup.com charges each group a month meetup fee. This is a GROUP fee and if not paid, our Boston French Bulldog meetups, would not exist.

Looking forward to seeing everyone there!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the small fenced in area of the park

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston French Bulldog April Saturday Meetup
